description: Log of all manual YouTube match corrections. Each entry records what was wrong, what was corrected, and when. This data is used to improve matching accuracy over time.

corrections.scraped_artist: Carrboro Bluegrass Festival Presents Bluegrass In The Backroom
corrections.reason: Festival/event name scraped as artist. Real bands are Six More Miles (headliner) and North State Grass (opener).
corrections.youtube_action: Removed incorrect festival video. Added North State Grass video (w54lLXcuv9g). Six More Miles has no video yet.
